directions: Stuff goat cheese into a corner of a Ziploc bag. Use scissors to cut a small hole in the tip of the corner.
Stuff each date with 2-3 rosemary leaves.
Wrap each date with a half piece of bacon and secure with a toothpick.
Arrange dates on parchment-lined baking sheet and cook for 7 minutes. Turn dates over and cook until bacon is crispy, about 7-8 minutes.
title: BACON-WRAPPED DATES WITH GOAT CHEESE AND ROSEMARY
